basics.name: Dang Viet Hung
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: With 13 years of experience in the field of software engineering, I have held various positions ranging from developer, tech lead, and manager, to 5 years of experience as a CTO. I had the honor of being ranked in the top 10 CTOs of the CTO Summit 2021 competition, as voted by vnexpress newspaper. I possess extensive knowledge and experience in web development, data engineering, cloud computing, and devops. My ability to build and develop teams from scratch includes activities such as conducting interviews, providing training, and leading teams.

work.summary: Develop a NAVI system that helps control all textile machines.
highlights: Work with Japanese team to understand Japan culture
Find the bug deadlock that already exist in 6 months

work.summary: Become the first integrated platform and ecosystem for logistics operation
highlights: Spearheaded team development, training, and growth
Successfully designed and implemented a comprehensive Transport Management System (TMS)
Deployment of an efficient Warehouse Management System (WMS)

work.summary: Become the first integrated platform and ecosystem for logistics operation
highlights: Build a transportation marketplace platform system to coordinate between trucker and shipper
Build a container optimization solutions to coordinate between shipping line and trucker
Build a data warehouse from multiple source
